short_summary: The Department of National Defense is looking for a contractor to perform the maintenance of breathing air systems in Montreal and Saint-Hubert.
description: The successful bidder will be responsible for the maintenance of breathing air systems located in Montreal and Saint-Hubert, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Official Government Tender Announcement
## Title (English)
W6844-22M020: Inspection, Preventive Maintenance, and Repair Services for Breathing Air Systems and Compressors

## Title (French)
W6844-22M020: Services d’inspection, d’entretien préventif, et de réparation des systèmes d’air respirable et des compresseurs

### Tender Details

| **Twig** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3823186939 |
| Amendment Number | 1 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3823186939 |
| Publication Date | March 16, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | March 21, 2023 (14:00:00) |
| Amendment Date | March 21, 2023 |
| Contract Start Date (Expected) | June 13, 2023 |
| Contract End Date (Expected) | June 12, 2024 |
| Tender Status (English) | Cancelled |
| Tender Status (French) | Annulé |
| UNSPSC | 40150000 (Industrial Pumps and Compressors) |

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is open to suppliers in countries with preferential agreements with Canada, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and others.

### Contracting Parties

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada K1A 0S5

### Project Requirements

* The contract involves the inspection, preventive maintenance, and repair of breathing air systems and compressors located in Montréal and Saint-Hubert, Québec, Canada.
* Successful contractors must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the tender closing date. Late bids will not be considered responsive.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Ayassou, Adina (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: adina.ayassou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

(Note: This tender announcement has been marked as cancelled at some point.)
